synopsis.text: In a futuristic universe where cultivation and science fiction intertwine, Li Yao, a prodigious weapon crafter, finds himself stagnant due to his underdeveloped psychic abilities. Serendipity strikes when he stumbles upon 40,000 years' worth of cultivation wisdom, unlocking new possibilities. Despite an initial setback involving a missed joint entrance exam, Li Yao's resilience, bolstered by the support of his mentors and friends, propels him to seize a second chance. He successfully enrolls in his desired university, embarking on a journey to fulfill his ambition of becoming an elite weapon refiner. Amidst the harsh realities of a universe shrouded in darkness, Li Yao and his fellow cultivators ignite sparks of hope, illuminating their path towards a brighter future.
